content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you experiencing a problem with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
It’s for a plumbing issue we’ve been having with the bathroom sink.
Thank you for letting me know. May I have your name, please, so I can get started with scheduling an appointment for you?
Thank you, Margaret. Could I get your address so we know where to send our plumber?
Thanks, Margaret! Can you let me know your preferred date and time for the plumber to visit?
Actually, I can’t pick a time yet. My husband has to approve it, so I’ll have to get back to you.
reason: Customer needs spouse's approval before scheduling.

content: No problem at all, Margaret. Whenever you're ready, just reply to this message and we’ll help you schedule an appointment. Have a great day!
reason: Customer needs spouse's approval before scheduling.
